item.title: By: Hyd
item.dc:creator: Hyd
item.description: This is Blizzard, remember? Look at Diablo, where the inventory was not only finite, but the items had dimensions as well (1x1 slot, 2x1, 3x2, etc). And just to make the 'game' of inventory arrangement even more fun, there was no 'Autoarrange' option, so you had to move that shit around by hand to make it all fit best.
item.content:encoded: This is Blizzard, remember? Look at Diablo, where the inventory was not only finite, but the items had dimensions as well (1×1 slot, 2×1, 3×2, etc). And just to make the ‘game’ of inventory arrangement even more fun, there was no ‘Autoarrange’ option, so you had to move that shit around by hand to make it all fit best.

item.title: By: Saccia
item.dc:creator: Saccia
item.description: I was a Warlock and I indeed killed myself and found another MMO to spend my time in. I suppose 1.10 was too late to save me.
item.content:encoded: I was a Warlock and I indeed killed myself and found another MMO to spend my time in. I suppose 1.10 was too late to save me.

item.title: By: Staarkhand
item.dc:creator: Staarkhand
item.description:
You speak truth. I can't remember the last time my inventory was better than 70/80, and that's using an AH mule, enchanting mule, leatherworking mule, mules holding crap I've forgotten about, and leaving about 20 items in my mail at all times. When I'm on my herbing rounds it's typically bag space that makes me quit (wtb mailbox in Un'Goro) unless I've taken it seriously and mailed all my raiding consumables to an alt.
And I know some classes/professions have it worse. I would kill myself if I were a Warlock.
item.content:encoded:
You speak truth. I can’t remember the last time my inventory was better than 70/80, and that’s using an AH mule, enchanting mule, leatherworking mule, mules holding crap I’ve forgotten about, and leaving about 20 items in my mail at all times. When I’m on my herbing rounds it’s typically bag space that makes me quit (wtb mailbox in Un’Goro) unless I’ve taken it seriously and mailed all my raiding consumables to an alt.

And I know some classes/professions have it worse. I would kill myself if I were a Warlock.

item.title: By: uruloki
item.dc:creator: uruloki
item.description: Managing bag space is stressful, even when your mule has all the extra slots.
item.content:encoded: Managing bag space is stressful, even when your mule has all the extra slots.

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description: If you're a pack rat that has trouble throwing things away, managing inventory is stressful, not fun, stressful. I think I've been holding onto the same damn mechanical yeti since February of last year. Those 10 rough grinding stones? Just let them go buddy, you haven't made a pearl handled dagger in over a year.
item.content:encoded: If you’re a pack rat that has trouble throwing things away, managing inventory is stressful, not fun, stressful. I think I’ve been holding onto the same damn mechanical yeti since February of last year. Those 10 rough grinding stones? Just let them go buddy, you haven’t made a pearl handled dagger in over a year.

item.title: By: Finster
item.dc:creator: Finster
item.description:
<blockquote>This may be the inane ramblings of a depraved mind, but I find it fun managing bag space.</blockquote>
I don't call that fun, I call that Bejeweled that you pay $15/month to play.
item.content:encoded:
This may be the inane ramblings of a depraved mind, but I find it fun managing bag space.

I don’t call that fun, I call that Bejeweled that you pay $15/month to play.
